Steps.StepString: Bypassing CAPTCHA through analyzing the algorithm, exploiting weaknesses in implementation, or using OCR tools
Identifying other vulnerabilities in the application using manual testing and automated tools like Burp Suite
Discovering a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in one of the input fields
Crafting a payload that would execute JavaScript code to retrieve the flag from the application's DOM or make a request to a sensitive endpoint
Submitting the payload which will execute the malicious script and send the flag to the attacker's server
